New Records: Christian Eriksen made a record 133rd appearance for Denmark
Key Match Events: The match ended in a 0-0 draw
Denmark had a disallowed goal after Jonas Wind wrestled Serbia's goalkeeper to the ground
Serbia had a disallowed goal ruled out early in the second half
Serbian fans hurled plastic cups onto the field after a disallowed goal
Post-Match Reflections: Denmark's coach Kasper Hjulmand expressed excitement about facing Germany next
Serbia's coach Dragan Stojkovic expressed disappointment but pride in the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match had the longest wait for the first attempt in a Euro 2024 game
Tennis great Novak Djokovic attended the match to cheer on Serbia
